{{Distinguish|K-Multimedia Player}} {{notability|date=August 2011}} {{primary sources|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox software |name = KMPlayer |logo = [[Image:KMPlayer icon.svg|70px]] |screenshot = [[Image:KMPlayer screenshot.png|300px]] |caption = KMPlayer on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] |latest release version = 0.11.2 |latest release date = {{start date and age|2010|03|04}} |platform = [[Unix-like|Unix-like operating systems]]
[[Microsoft Windows]] (via [[Cygwin]])
[[Mac OS X]] (via [[Fink]]) |language = English |programming language = [[C++]] |genre = [[Media player (application software)|Media player]] |license = [[GNU General Public License]] |website = [http://kmplayer.kde.org/ kmplayer.kde.org] }} '''KMPlayer''' ('''K'''onqueror '''M'''edia '''P'''layer) is a video player by [[KDE]]. It is both a plugin for [[Konqueror]], as well as a standalone video player. It is capable of running [[MPlayer]] or [[xine]] as a backend. ==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[Comparison of video player software]] ==External links== *[http://kmplayer.kde.org/ Official website of KMPlayer] [[Category:KDE Extragear]] [[Category:KDE software]] [[Category:Software that uses Qt]] {{KDE}} {{KDE-stub}} {{Free-software-stub}} {{multimedia-software-stub}} [[bg:KMPlayer]] [[cs:KMPlayer]] [[es:Konqueror Media Player]] [[ko:KMPlayer]] [[ja:KMPlayer]] [[pt:Konqueror Media Player]] [[ru:KMPlayer]] [[sk:KMPlayer]] [[zh:KMPlayer]]
